adHeader: FREE 1 HR Lesson $35 One on One PIANO LESSONS in EVERGREEN area 95148
adDetails: FREE 1 HOUR PIANO LESSON ( VALUE $35 ) * Private One on One piano lessons for beginners to advanced in my home studio (Evergreen Area- San Jose 95148) * I have over 10 years of experience with piano teaching in classical and contemporary music. You will learn to play great popular, blues, classical and accompaniment pieces after a couple of lessons. My teaching method is tailored to each student's learning style. IT IS NEVER TOO LATE TO LEARN. * This is my full time professional piano teaching. I offer music lessons 7 days a week: Monday to Sunday from 9 AM to 9 PM. Flexible schedule. * All ages are welcomed. Start from ages 5+ (Teens, Adult, Seniors) *TUITION: $35 for 60 Minutes. $30 for 45 Minutes. $25 for 30 Minutes. Fee will be collected at the beginning of the lesson session. You will get 1 free lesson if pay advanced 10 lessons. Why is my tuition such at an affordable price? Because I have a passion to give everyone a chance to learn and play great music. Please call/ text me ANDY DIEP NGUYEN show contact info ADDRESS: 2680 MISSION GREENS DRIVE SAN JOSE , CA 95148 *** Thank you for your interest. ** I look forward to meeting you.
